backend/main.mo: Main canister logic defining salons, bookings, user profiles, images, authorization mixins, and initial salon seeding.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module transferring old stable state to new format while resetting monopolyMode to false.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and components with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light and dark mode color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file bootstrapping the frontend and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app handling authentication, profile loading, and routing between client and pro dashboards.
frontend/src/components/AuthHeader.tsx: Header component showing location or pro badge, notifications, and logout handling.
Empty placeholder file intended for a salon creation form.
frontend/src/components/MemberCard.tsx: Loyalty card UI showing tier, XP, progress to next tier, and reward details.
frontend/src/components/MonopolyModeSwit: Toggle switch component controlling a monopolyMode state with animated styles.
frontend/src/components/MotionButton.tsx: Button wrapper adding a press-scale motion effect using forwardRef.
frontend/src/components/PremiumBadge.tsx: Small badge component displaying a Premium label with an icon.
frontend/src/components/Pressable.tsx: Pressable wrapper that can render as button or div with an active scale effect.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal form for initial user profile setup with name and role selection.
frontend/src/components/ProSalonWizard.t: Multi-step salon creation wizard handling details, services, images, and submission logic.
frontend/src/components/RevenueChart.tsx: Static weekly revenue area chart rendered with Recharts.
frontend/src/components/SalonListSection: Salon list with category filtering, featured item display, and image loading logic.
frontend/src/components/VipDashboard.tsx: VIP dashboard showing XP, tier progress, and rewards with loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching a backend actor tied to identity, with automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, creating and managing AuthClient state, login flow, and stored identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, salons, categories, images, and bookings via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSalonImage.ts: Loads a salon image using a query hook and converts it to a Blob URL for display, with cleanup handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup with custom CSS variables, dark mode values, and scrollbar hiding helpers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDashboardPage.t: Implements the client dashboard with tab navigation, salon listings, profile view, and salon detail transitions.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login screen and triggers Internet Identity authentication with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/ProDashboardPage.tsx: Implements the pro dashboard with revenue stats, team list, salon creation wizard, and tabbed navigation.
frontend/src/pages/SalonDetailsPage.tsx: Page React affichant les détails d’un salon, son image, services, créneaux disponibles et permet de réserver via useBookSalon.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Fonctions utilitaires pour formater des montants en francs suisses au format normal ou compact.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilitaires pour lire, stocker, persister et nettoyer des paramètres d’URL ou de sessionStorage, compatibles routing hash et query.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configuration Tailwind étendue avec couleurs OKLCH, animations, plugins typographie, container queries et animate.
project_state.json: Fichier d’état projet décrivant objectifs, architecture, problèmes connus et fonctionnalités existantes pour la refonte frontend luxe V3.
